Enjoyed the latte art experience with Julien very much! The workshop was very fun and informative and we had lots of chances to practice the technique of making latte art. Would recommend.
Julien was super good at conducting the latte art course. Breaks down the techniques into simple and easy to understand methods...do come and learn...shiok!!!

Took a hand drip workshop and I was very happy I chose this. The instructor, Julien, was really knowledgeable and the session was full of new insights for me. Learned how to make my own hand drip recipe, and now I'm excited to start my own experiment to make my own recipe!

Went for a v60 workshop and thoroughly enjoyed it! Julien is knowledgeable and conducts the workshop smoothly. He taught us how to taste coffee and gave us his recipe to make a delicious cup of hand drip coffee. It was a fun workshop and we learnt plenty!
